title: Part 214 - Uniform Civil Rules for the Justice Courts
content:
Part 214 - Uniform Civil Rules for the Justice Courts

§ 214.1 - Application of Part; waiver; additional rules; definitions
§ 214.2 - Place and hours of court
§ 214.3 - Summons
§ 214.4 - Pleadings

§ 214.7 - Conciliation conference
§ 214.8 - Appeals

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
